name: Heavy Highway Racer
description:
Enjoy driving fast and overtaking without crashing your car in to busy traffic, rush hour traffic is extreme so be careful while driving in that time as cars on roads are much worse, overtake your sports vehicles carefully without hitting others, it is a very thrilling drive once you get on the road just fasten your seat belt and drive your car like a maniac without caring about the speed limit on road.

Features:
* Incredible World
* Wonderful Levels
* Amazing Smooth Controls
* Physics Based Virtual-Reality
* Best Car Physics
